templates.name: Kopano Server
templates.description:
Kopano Core Templates

To be used specifically with https://github.com/tiredofit/docker-kopano/

items.name: Kopano Server: Cache - ABInfo Maximum size
Kopano Server: Cache - ACL Maximum size
Kopano Server: Cache - Cell Maximum size
Kopano Server: Cache - Extern Maximum size
Kopano Server: Cache - Index1 Maximum size
Kopano Server: Cache - Index2 Maximum size
Kopano Server: Cache - Obj Maximum size
Kopano Server: Cache - Quota Maximum size
Kopano Server: Cache - Server Maximum size
Kopano Server: Cache - Store Maximum size
Kopano Server: Cache - UQuota Maximum size
Kopano Server: Cache - UserID Maximum size
Kopano Server: Counter resyncs
items.description: Number of times a counter resync was required

items.name: Kopano Server: Deferred Fetches
items.description: Number of rows retrieved via deferred write table

items.name: Kopano Server: Deferred Merges
items.description: Number of merges applied to deferred write table

items.name: Kopano Server: Deferred Records
items.description: Number of records merged applied to deferred write table

items.name: Kopano Server: Get Statistics
items.description: system.run[sudo kopano-stats --system -d | tail -n +2]

items.name: Kopano Server: Index Search Query Average
items.description: Average duration (in us) of an indexed search query

items.name: Kopano Server: Index Search Query Errors
items.description: Number of failed indexer queries

items.name: Kopano Server: Index Search Query Maximum Duration
items.description: Maximum Duration (in us) of an indexed search query

items.name: Kopano Server: LDAP - Connections to Server
Kopano Server: LDAP - Connections to Server FAILED
Kopano Server: LDAP - Maximum Auth duration (us)
Kopano Server: LDAP - Maximum Connect duration (us)
Kopano Server: LDAP - Maximum Search duration (us)
Kopano Server: Login SSL
items.description: Logins via SSL Certificate

items.name: Kopano Server: Login SSO
items.description: Number of logins via SSO

items.name: Kopano Server: Login Unix
items.description: Number of logins via Unix Socket

items.name: Kopano Server: Objects Subscribed
items.description: Objects Subscribed

items.name: Kopano Server: Objects Subscribed Size
items.description: Memory usage of subscribed objects

items.name: Kopano Server: SOAP Cumulated Process Time
items.description: Cumulated wallclock time taken to process SOAP requests in seconds

items.name: Kopano Server: SOAP Cumulated Response Time
Kopano Server: DB Row Reads
items.description: Numberof table rows read in row order

items.name: Kopano Server: Search Folders - Updates
items.description: Number of events waiting for search folder updates

items.name: Kopano Server: Search Folders - In Use
items.description: Number of folders in use by search folders

items.name: Kopano Server: Search Folders - Loaded
items.description: Total number of search folders

items.name: Kopano Server: Search Folders - Memory Usage
items.description: Memory usage of search folders

items.name: Kopano Server: Search Folders - Stores
items.description: Number of stores in use by search folders

items.name: Kopano Server: Search Folders - Threads
items.description: Number of running search folder threads

items.name: Kopano Server: Search Folders - Updates FAILED
items.description: Number of events waiting for search folder updates

items.name: Kopano Server: Search Folders - Updates RETRY
items.description: Number of times a search folder update was restarted

items.name: Kopano Server: DB Searches
items.description: Number of database searched performed

items.name: Kopano Server: DB Searches Indexed
items.description: Number of database indexed searched performed

items.name: Kopano Server: Sessions Size
items.description: Memory usage of sessions

items.name: Kopano Server: Sessions Timed Out
items.description: Number of timed out sessions

items.name: Kopano Server: SQL Connections
items.description: Number of SQL Connections made to SQL Server

items.name: Kopano Server: SQL Connections Failed
items.description: Number of Failed SQL Connections made to SQL Server

items.name: Kopano Server: SQL DELETE
items.description: Number of SQL DELETE commands executed

items.name: Kopano Server: SQL DELETE FAILED
items.description: Number of SQL DELETE commands failed

items.name: Kopano Server: SQL INSERT
items.description: Number of SQL INSERT commands executed

items.name: Kopano Server: SQL INSERT FAILED
items.description: Number of SQL INSERT commands failed

items.name: Kopano Server: SQL SELECT
items.description: Number of SQL INSERT commands executed

items.name: Kopano Server: SQL SELECT FAILED
items.description: Number of SQL INSERT commands failed

items.name: Kopano Server: SQL UPDATE
items.description: Number of SQL DELETE commands executed

items.name: Kopano Server: SQL UPDATE FAILED
items.description: Number of SQL UPDATE commands failed

items.name: Kopano Server: Tables Subscribed Size
items.description: Memory usage of subscribed tables

parameters: threads;Number of threads running to process items;([0-9].*)
